name: Dagger of Veiled Shadows
tooltip:
Dagger of Veiled ShadowsLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Spiked Hilt, 2  Vermillion Idols, 5 Gold Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Spiked Hilt
- Vermillion Idol x 2
- Gold Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
